name: Sacdiyo Mohamed
title: Graphic Designer
oraahda: In promotion and advertising, a testimonial or show consists of a person's written or spoken statement extolling the virtue of a product. The term  most commonly applies to the sales-pitches attributed to ordinary citizens, whereas the word endorsement usually applies to pitches by celebrities.
